trans-unit.source: Converts colors from one data type to another.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer farger fra en datatype til en annen.

trans-unit.source: Access this class through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Få tilgang til denne klassen via den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When converting from a string to a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> the ColorConverter expects the unqualified color name; otherwise, an exception will occur in the conversion process.
trans-unit.target: Ved konvertering fra streng til en <xref:System.Drawing.Color>i ColorConverter forventer fargenavnet ukvalifiserte; ellers et unntak vil inntreffe om konverteringen.</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: For example, you should pass "Blue", not "System.Drawing.Color.Blue" or "Color.Blue", to the <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel du skal sende "Blue", ikke "System.Drawing.Color.Blue" eller "Color.Blue" for den <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ColorConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.ColorConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines if this converter can convert an object in the given source type to the native type of the converter.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere et objekt i den angitte kildetypen til den opprinnelige typen konverteringen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to get additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke dette objektet til å få mer informasjon om miljøet som denne konverteringsprogram som aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: The type from which you want to convert.
trans-unit.target: Typen du vil konvertere.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette objektet kan utføre konverteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om denne konverteringsprogram kan konvertere et objekt til den angitte måltypen ved hjelp av konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to which you want to convert.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer typen du vil konvertere.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne konverteringsprogram kan utføre operasjonen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the given object to the converter's native type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer det angitte objektet til den opprinnelige konverteringstype.

trans-unit.source: When converting from a string to a <xref:System.Drawing.Color> the <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter> expects the unqualified color name; otherwise, an exception will occur in the conversion process.
trans-unit.target: Ved konvertering fra streng til en <xref:System.Drawing.Color>i <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter>forventer den ukvalifiserte farge navnet; ellers, et unntak vil inntreffe om konverteringen.</xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: For example, you should pass "Blue", not "System.Drawing.Color.Blue" or "Color.Blue", to the <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel du skal sende "Blue", ikke "System.Drawing.Color.Blue" eller "Color.Blue" for den <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to get additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke dette objektet til å få mer informasjon om miljøet som denne konverteringsprogram som aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to represent the color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som angir kulturen som skal representere fargen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal konverteres.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer konverterte verdien.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen kan ikke utføres.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to another type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer det angitte objektet til en annen type.

trans-unit.source: The most common conversion is to or from a string.
trans-unit.target: Vanligste konverteringen er til eller fra en streng.

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: En formatering-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: Use this object to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk dette objektet til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om miljøet som denne konverteringsprogram som aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Always check whether this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller om denne verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet kan returnere <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the culture to represent the color.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som angir kulturen som skal representere fargen.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som skal konverteres.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: Typen konvertere til.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing the converted value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer konverterte verdien.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: destinationtype is .
trans-unit.target: destinationtypeis .

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringen kan ikke utføres.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection containing a set of standard values for the data type for which this validator is designed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling som inneholder et sett med standardverdier for datatypen for dette validerer utformes.

trans-unit.source: This will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the data type does not support a standard set of values.
trans-unit.target: Dette vil returnere <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis datatypen ikke støtter et standard sett med verdier.

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: En formatering-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: Use this object to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Bruk dette objektet til å trekke ut tilleggsinformasjon om miljøet som denne konverteringsprogram som aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Always check whether this value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller om denne verdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet kan returnere <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection containing <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or a standard set of valid values.
trans-unit.target: En samling som omfatter <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller et standard sett med gyldige verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering alltid returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if this object supports a standard set of values that can be chosen from a list.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om dette objektet støtter et standard sett med verdier som kan velges fra en liste.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref> via som ytterligere kontekst kan angis.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.GetStandardValues*> must be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis <xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.GetStandardValues*>må være kall til å finne et vanlig sett med verdier objektet støtter; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Drawing.ColorConverter.GetStandardValues*>
